description: Try our easy to follow Mongolian Beef With Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mongolian Beef With Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice steak and reserved onion. Serve noodles with steak and vegetables. Spoon over sauce and garnish with onion.
